item.title: Why isn't this code working
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

[quote=“kevin5475845, post:4, topic:95122”]dunno if this work… but you can try it out

Your Boolean Process I Suppose

if (IsDead) { if(playerIsSaradomin == true) { IsDead = false; NewHP = 99; teleportToX = 2427; teleportToY = 3077; heightLevel = 1; playerIsSaradomin = true; sendMessage("You died in castle wars"); } } if (IsDead) { if(playerIsZamorak == true) { IsDead = false; NewHP = 99; teleportToX = 2427; teleportToY = 3077; heightLevel = 1; playerIsZamorak = true; sendMessage("You died in Castle wars"); } } [/quote]
yep it works, I would rep ++ you if I could, I spent literaly about 2 hours trying everything to get that code and to get it to work, thanks…thanks.

item.title: Why isn't this code working
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

dunno if this work… but you can try it out

Your Boolean Process I Suppose

if (IsDead) {
if(playerIsSaradomin) {
IsDead = false;
NewHP = 99;
teleportToX = 2427;
teleportToY = 3077;
heightLevel = 1;
playerIsSaradomin = true;
sendMessage("You died in castle wars");
}
}
if (IsDead) {
if(playerIsZamorak) {
IsDead = false;
NewHP = 99;
teleportToX = 2427;
teleportToY = 3077;
heightLevel = 1;
playerIsZamorak = true;
sendMessage("You died in Castle wars");
}
}

item.title: Why isn't this code working
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

Why isn’t this code for castle wars working. It’s supposed to make you tele back to your base in castle wars if your hp gets to 20 or lower. Here’s the int and 2 booleans it uses:

public int miHP = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; public boolean playerIsSaradomin = false; public boolean playerIsZamorak = false;

The mihp one is the one that’s supposed recognize what you’re hp is.

Here is the actual code:

if (miHP <= 20) { if(playerIsSaradomin == true) { miHP = 99; teleportToX = 2427; teleportToY = 3077; heightLevel = 1; playerIsSaradomin = true; sendMessage("You died in castle wars"); } if (miHP <= 20) if(playerIsZamorak == true) { miHP = 99; teleportToX = 2427; teleportToY = 3077; heightLevel = 1; playerIsZamorak = true; sendMessage("You died in Castle wars"); } }

I compile it and it compiles correctly but when I run the code and I join castle wars and ask somebody from the other team to kill me I just die like regular and go to where you usualy go when you die in varrok. I don’t understand why the codes not working could somebody please tell me.

Read full topic
